name: Sapolote Quiz
description:
Sapolote Quiz its a game developed in android studio as an university project. It is a quiz about animals focusing on toads and axolots, it contains multimedia questions and text questions.

it includes these features:

- 3 different languages

- 2 themes 

- Users 

- Practice mode

- ...

Made by Carlos Chamizo Cano and Sergio Mulas Azabal
